Entries.accept_788: Oh? After all this time... very well, I suppose *someone* has to take it in her stead. I shall treat this item with great respect.

Entries.accept_789: ...I see. Well, this is an odd memento, but... I'll put it where it belongs.

Entries.accept_790: My... that's a very comforting smell. Yes, this is most assuredly an honorable item.
